name: Lucky Knife
description:
In the game, your task is to throw a knife to cut various items. How to control your accuracy and strength well is the key to passing the game. In short, you need to insert all the knives into the target and avoid touching each other.
You are a sharp shooter and will use your skills to throw knives at this spinning target. The right time is needed when throwing the knife. Don't let the knives touch each other, otherwise the game will end.
